name: Motor Bike Stunt Racing
description:
Motor Bike Racing is a Snow Sports bike Racing game with spectacular stunts and twists!
Your goal on motor Bike Racing is to rack up point by catching air and pulling insane stunts and trick moves while competing the opponents!

With three different islands to explore, the ability to customize your bike and outfit, With number of cool jumps and stunts to perform, Trax Bike Racing will keep you entertained for hours!
